meanings.sent1: The king lived in an opulent palace.
meanings.sent2: The opulent mansion had golden chandeliers.
meanings.sent3: The opulent feast left everyone feeling full and happy.
meanings.sent4: Her opulent jewelry collection sparkled like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The opulent garden was a paradise of colorful flowers and lush greenery.

meanings.definition: Lavish or luxurious in a way that shows wealth.
meanings.sent1: The opulent car gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She wore an opulent gown to the ball.
meanings.sent3: The opulent yacht sailed gracefully on the calm sea.
meanings.sent4: His opulent lifestyle was the envy of all his friends.
meanings.sent5: The opulent hotel room had a breathtaking view of the city skyline.
